meanings.definition: The point in the orbit of a planet or comet at which it is farthest from the sun.
meanings.sent1: The apside of the comet marks the farthest point from the sun.
meanings.sent2: The planet reaches its apside when it is at the greatest distance from the sun.
meanings.sent3: The comet waved goodbye to the sun at its apside.
meanings.sent4: At the apside, the planet seems to shy away from the sun's warmth.
meanings.sent5: The apside is like a boundary where the planet keeps its distance from the sun.

meanings.definition: The point in the orbit of a satellite at which it is farthest from the body around which it revolves.
meanings.sent1: The satellite's apside is where it is farthest from the central body.
meanings.sent2: When the satellite reaches its apside, it is at its maximum distance from the planet.
meanings.sent3: The satellite threw a party at its apside, celebrating the distance.
meanings.sent4: The apside of the satellite is like a moment of freedom in space.
meanings.sent5: At the apside, the satellite enjoys the vastness of space away from the planet.
